#summary Show the system requirements

= System Requirements =

The system can be used in any operating system which support [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html Oracle Java SE 7] or later and the [http://www.mysql.com/ MySQL Server 5.1] or later.

The system has been tested with all its parts running on Windows 7 or Linux operating system. Also, mixed environments were tested with the database on a Linux server and the Desktop tool running on Windows.
